#Draft Plots
##Blood Lactate
```{r}
Bla_SUM<-main_df%>%
  summarySE(measurevar = "Bla", groupvar =c("Session","Time_Point", "Speed","BFR"), na.rm = TRUE, conf.interval = 0.95, .drop = TRUE)
```

```{r}
Bla_SUM$Session_f = factor(Bla_SUM$Session, levels=c("SW","SWBFR","FW", "FWBFR"))
 Session_f.labs<- c("Low-Intensity", "Low-Intensity + BFR", "Moderate-Intensity", "Moderate-Intensity + BFR")
 names(Session_f.labs)<-c("SW","SWBFR","FW", "FWBFR")
 
Bla_SUM$Speed_f = factor(Bla_SUM$Speed, levels=c("SW", "FW"))
 Speed.labs<- c("Low-Intensity","Moderate-Intensity")
 names(Speed.labs)<-c("SW", "FW")
 
Bla_SUM$Time_Point_f = factor(Bla_SUM$Time_Point, levels=c("1", "2", "3"))
Time_Point.labs<- c("Pre-Exercise", "Post-Exercise Finger", "Post-Exercise Toe")
names(Time_Point.labs)<-c("1", "2", "3")
 

Bla_PLOT_1 <- ggplot(Bla_SUM, aes(x = Time_Point_f, y= Bla))+
            geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = Bla-se, ymax =Bla+se, group = Session), width = 0.3, colour = "black", position = position_dodge(width = 0.5))+
            geom_point(aes(shape = Session), fill = "white", colour = "black", size = 5, stroke = 1.8, position = position_dodge(width = 0.5))+
  
            scale_colour_manual(name = "Session_f",
                            labels = Session_f.labs,
                            values = c("black", "black", "black", "black"))+
  
            scale_shape_manual(name = "Session_f",
                           labels = Session_f.labs,
                           values = c(22, 15, 21, 16))+
            theme_classic()+
            theme(legend.position="right", legend.title=element_blank())+
            xlab("\n Collection Time Point")+
            scale_y_continuous(name = "Blood Lactate Concentration (mmol/L) \n",breaks = c(0,1,2,3,4,5,6), limits = c(0,6))+
            scale_x_discrete(breaks=c("1", "2", "3"),
              labels=c("Pre-Exercise", "Post-Exercise Finger", "Post-Exercise Toe"))

Bla_PLOT_1
 
```
